attributes.action: Take down the new Government Covid-19 advert.
attributes.additional_details: A few days ago, I sadly lost my grandad to Covid.  It was unexpected and he did everything he could do to stop the spread.  He didn’t go out and could only have been infected through food deliveries.  The constant reminder of what my family. as well as the thousands of people who are going through the same as myself, is extremely upsetting.  There are also arguments that the Government’s mixed messages have also lead to this spread and is seen as guilt tripping and insensitive.
attributes.background: I would like the new covid-19 government advert to be taken down permanently, or aired less due to the upset it has caused to those who have lost loved ones and those who suffered with the illness.  It is not respectful and only gives us a constant reminder on what we have lost.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Stop the government's "look into his/her eyes" coronavirus campaign
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/572596
